mapper.sql: select b.create_time,b.number,goods.goods_id,goods.goods_name, goods.goods_main_image,goods_now_price,goods_old_price from goods,goods_sku,browse_record, (select create_time,count(create_time) as number from browse_record GROUP BY create_time) as b where browse_record.goods_id=goods.goods_id and goods_sku.goods_id=goods.goods_id and b.create_time=browse_record.browse_record_id ORDER BY browse_record.create_time DESC
